value.title: Use containers for your Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) Apps
value.excerpt: The Language Understanding (LUIS) container loads your trained or published Language Understanding model. As a LUIS app, the docker container provides access to the query predictions from the container's API endpoints

value.excerpt: Use entity behavior analytics in Azure Sentinel

value.title: Use the Q# libraries
value.excerpt: Learn about libraries in Q# and how to add them to your projects, discover the Q# API documentation, implement another application of Grover's algorithm using the Standard and Numerics libraries, and document your own code.

value.title: Use watchlists in Azure Sentinel
value.excerpt: Use watchlists in Azure Sentinel

value.title: Using IAAS support with Azure for SAP workloads
value.excerpt: There are a variety of commonly used SAP-certified operating systems supported by SAP running on Azure VMs, and there are also several different methods of provisioning storage for SAP workloads in Azure. In this module, you will learn the SAP recommended support products and VM types as well as the network, database, and monitoring requirements.

value.title: Using IoT Central with Connected Field Service for Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: This module will focus on using IoT Central with Connected Field Service add-on for Dynamics 365 for Field Service.  The module will walk you through building an IoT Central application and escalating the alerts into Dynamics 365.

value.excerpt: Utilize Azure for SAP Workloads Reference Architecture

value.title: Create views and templates in Django
value.excerpt: Learn about the templating engine in Django to create dynamic HTML. In this module, you'll create views and use template variables, inheritance, and tags.

value.title: Accelerating HPC Storage with the Azure FXT Edge Filer | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In high performance computing (HPC) workloads, access to storage matters. In this episode, Scott Hanselman and Ron Hogue discuss the new Azure FXT Edge Filer, a new appliance that creates a powerful cache on-premises connecting network attached storage (NAS) and Azure Blob.  Azure FXT Edge Filer overview

value.title: ACR Build: Automate Docker builds with OS and framework patching | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Steve Lasker joins Lara Rubbelke to discuss ACR Build, a cloud-native container build solution enabling pre-check, git commit and base image update docker builds for OS and framework patching. value.title: An intro to Azure Cosmos DB JavaScript SDK 2.0 | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Chris Anderson joins Donovan Brown to discuss Azure Cosmos DB JavaScript SDK 2.0, which adds support for multi-region writes, a new fluent-style object model—making it easier to reference Azure Cosmos DB resources without an explicit URL—and support for promises and other modern JavaScript features.
